tool_description: Based on the stable diffusion model, it supports dozens of different hairstyles and colors, with each generated result being unique. It can simultaneously produce up to four result images for easy comparison and selection of the most suitable hairstyle.
name: Hairstyle Changer Pro
title: Hairstyle Changer Pro

api_list.name: Retrieve Task Results by task_id

code.description: Error Code. Compared to the error_code_str field: The code field is more precise.

code_message.description: The information represented by the Error Code(code).

message.description: Supplementary information for the code_message field.

data.description: The content of the result data returned.

images.description: Result URL address. Note: The URL address is a temporary address, valid for 24 hours, and will not be accessible after the expiration date.
